column4: passed away at 12:57 p. m. tuesday
column7: at indiana university health bedford hospital. born october 16
column10: he was the son of pearl (ross) haynes. he married mildred alene scott june 29
column11: 1968. he retired from carpenter body works and was a member of the mitchell wesleyan church. surviving: wife
column16: sydney marie sue haynes anthony andrew wayne wood. his parents and brothers
column18: preceded him in death. funeral service will be at 10:30 a. m. saturday
column20: in the memorial chapel of chastain funeral home & cremation center with reverend steve jones officiating. burial will be in mitchell cemetery. friends may call from 5:00-8:00 p. m. on friday and from 9:30 a. m. until the service on saturday at the funeral home.
